resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156580</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156580</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3150</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Know your Country</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennen Sie Ihr Land</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Connaissez votre pays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conheça seu país</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conosca il vostro paese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξέρτε τη χώρα σας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conozca su país</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a work sheet for students explore and answer questions about their home country.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">country</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capital city</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Arbeit Blatt für Kursteilnehmer 
erforschen und beantworten Fragen über ihr Heimatland.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une feuille de travail pour des étudiants 
explorent et répondent à des questions au sujet de leur pays 
d'origine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha do trabalho para estudantes 
explora e responde a perguntas sobre seu país home.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio del lavoro per gli allievi 
esplora e risponde alle domande circa il loro pæse d'origine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας γιατί οι σπουδαστές 
ερευνούν και απαντούν στις ερωτήσεις για τη βασική χώρα τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja del trabajo para los estudiantes
explora y contesta a preguntas sobre su país de orígen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauptstadt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ville capitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cidade importanta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">città capitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χώρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύρια πόλη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciudad capital</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3150</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>other</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">12-16</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">12-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Rural English Education Department</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>427</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">English language</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>540</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">geography</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>156580</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://w3.kfar-olami.org.il/reed/resources/landmark/activities/COUNTRY.htm</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
